title: iLivestock

creator: Duradiamond Software Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
iLivestock is Cattle & Sheep management software which is developed & tested in sunny" Scotland and uses your smartphone or tablet to make it easy to manage your flock or herd on the go.

We believe that the farm software sector is fragmented and complex, add in the different types of hardware options for reading and weighing and it becomes even more complicated. The iLivestock team has over 10 years experience in this specific sector and we have now converted that experience into code.

The result is iLivestock

title: iLivestock

creator: Duradiamond Software Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
iLivestock is designed to fit your farm and your routine, whatever that looks like. We don't believe limiting users to a certain way of working or using specific hardware benefits anyone.

iLivestock works on Apple iOS and Android phones and tablets, and features an online portal for computer access. Working with multiple EID readers, weigh indicators and load bars, iLivestock can quickly and easily become your farm information hub.

iLivestock, works everywhere you do, online or offline using the latest technology, the application is automatically backed up your data and shares it across all of your devices.

Install iLivestock and start your free, one month trial today:

- **Have a proper look around:** 1 month of unrestricted access.
- **We'll help:** Regular email hints and tips.
- **Guided tour**: Take a look around the app online with our 'digital onboarding' series.
- **Speak to us:** Have a 1:1 demonstration with a Customer Success Specialist, we'll even help set up and connect any compatible hardware you own.
- **Discuss:** Organised group sessions to help you realise as many benefits of digital record keeping, EID and weighing as possible.
- **Zero pressure**: We don't ask for payment details in advance, won't delete your farm data if you choose not to subscribe and will never recommend new equipment if you don't need it.

**What it does:**

- Saves time, on average 8 hours per month.
- Reduces compliance paperwork and stress.
- Collects and stores data data for review, allowing better decision making.

**How it does it:**

- Usability - Clear information, accessed through easy navigation.
- Connectivity - Pairing options with multiple manufacturers.
- Accessibility - Available on multiple devices, with multiple users, with or without an internet connection.

**Why it does it:**

- To simplify farm compliance & record keeping.
- To remove cost barriers to effective livestock management and weighing.
- To allow data capture to fit seamlessly in to farming routines.
descriptionShort: Livestock management in the palm of your hand.

title: iLivestock

creator: Duradiamond Software Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
How much time do you spend on farm paperwork every week? Do you struggle with managing your farm operations efficiently? If you are like most farmers, you probably spend a lot of time on farm paperwork. This can be tedious, time-consuming, and stressful. But what if there was a better way?

Look no further than iLivestock, the app that puts livestock management in your pocket!

iLivestock is a simple, affordable, and integrated livestock management solution for your cattle and/or sheep farm. It simplifies your farm administration tasks, and helps you run your farm more effectively.

With iLivestock, you can:
- Record and access all your animal data anytime, anywhere, even offline
- Save up to 8 hours a week on compliance paperwork
- Produce compliance reports with a touch of a button
- Keep everyone on the farm informed with real-time updates
- Get direct support from our experienced staff in the field, online or via in-app chat

iLivestock is more than just an app. It’s a platform designed to fit seamlessly into your farming routines, and to grow with your farm business. No matter the size of your flock or herd.

- Test drive the demo app with realistic data that resets every 24 hours.
- Switch to a monthly or yearly subscription anytime and start using iLivestock for your own data.

WHY CHOOSE ILIVESTOCK OVER OTHER APPS?
Unlike other apps that can be complicated, expensive, or limited in functionality, iLivestock offers a complete and flexible app that meets your needs. Here are some of the advantages of iLivestock:

- iLivestock offers both cattle and sheep management within one app. You can manage flocks and herds on the go, using a smartphone or tablet.
- You only pay for what you need with iLivestock. Our two basic payment plans include unlimited records for sheep and cattle, and unlimited devices. No hidden fees or extra charges.
- iLivestock lets you record and access your livestock information anytime, anywhere. Whether you’re on the farm or at home, you can easily capture data and generate reports with our flexible and user-friendly dashboard.
- The iLivestock technology is developed and tested in the UK. It has been tested in harsh weather conditions and proven to save time, money, and hassle.
- iLivestock gives you the freedom to choose how much data you want to record about your animals. You can either start with the basics, such as vaccinations, compliance reporting or weight, and build up from there. Or you can go all-in and record everything from birth to sale.

REVIEWS
“I run my farm next to a fulltime job. I was looking for something to store and process farm information electronically, and be able to do it while you're in the field. iLivestock is a simple method to manage my pedigree flock of Suffolk sheep and helps me organise my farm admin.” ~ Steve Penberthy, Breage

“We didn't use any kind of technology before. We held paper records for the herd, which wasn’t ideal. Now, by the time we get to the sales, we know exactly what to buy and what to leave.” ~ Zoe Norton, Bures

“Because all information is handled digitally, it is much easier to send my reports to the required government database. With a push of a button, I can export all the information and email the file over.” ~ Andrew Powers, Ledbury

So what are you waiting for? Join the iLivestock community today and discover the difference it can make for your farm. You’ll be amazed by how easy and convenient livestock management can be.
